title: on it by section 31 of the Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005 (as
heading: 1. The Social Care Workers Registration Board Approved Qualifications
text_raw:
1. The Social Care Workers Registration Board Approved Qualifications 
Bye-Law 2024 is hereby revoked with effect from the date specified in paragraph
text_norm: 1 social care worker registration board approved qualification bye-law 2024 hereby revoked effect date specified paragraph

title: on it by section 31 of the Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005 (as
heading: 2.(2), without prejudice to any applications for registration or restoration
text_raw:
2.(2), without prejudice to any applications for registration or restoration 
received by the board prior to that date.
text_norm: 2.(2) without prejudice application registration restoration received board prior date

title: on it by section 31 of the Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005 (as
heading: 2. (1) The bye-law may be cited as the Social Care Workers Registration
text_raw:
2. (1) The bye-law may be cited as the Social Care Workers Registration 

Board Approved Qualifications Bye-Law 2025. 

(2) The bye-law comes into operation on 26 August 2025.
text_norm: 2 (1) bye-law may cited social care worker registration board approved qualification bye-law 2025 (2) bye-law come operation 26 august 2025

title: on it by section 31 of the Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005 (as
heading: In the bye-law –
text_raw:
3. 

In the bye-law – 

“the Act” means the Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005 (no.27 of 
2005) (as amended from time to time); 

“the Register” means the register of the Social Care Workers Registration Board 
established under section 36(1)(a) of the Act.
text_norm: 3 bye-law - act mean health social care professional act 2005 (no.27 2005) (as amended time time) register mean register social care worker registration board established section 36(1)(a) act

title: on it by section 31 of the Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005 (as
heading: 4. The Social Care Workers Registration Board, for the purposes of Section
text_raw:
4. The Social Care Workers Registration Board, for the purposes of Section 
38(2)(a) of the Act, hereby approves the following qualifications as attesting to 
the standard of proficiency required for registration in the Register: 

(1) Bachelor of Arts (Honours) 

in Social Care Practice, Atlantic 

Technological University 

(2) Bachelor of Arts (Honours) 

in Applied Social Care, Atlantic 

Technological University 

(3) Bachelor of Arts in Applied Social Care, Atlantic Technological 

University 

(4) Bachelor of Arts (Honours) in Social Care Practice, Institute of 

Technology, Sligo 

(5) Bachelor of Arts (Honours) in Applied Social Care, Galway-Mayo 

Institute of Technology 

(6) Bachelor of Arts in Applied Social Care, Galway-Mayo Institute of 

Technology 

(7) Bachelor of Arts (Honours) in Social Care, Dundalk Institute of 

Technology 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 29th August, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [416] 3 

(8) Bachelor of Arts in Social Care, Munster Technological University 

(9) Bachelor of Arts in Social Care, Institute of Technology, Tralee 

(10) Honours Bachelor of Arts (Social Care), National University of Ireland, 

Galway 

(11) Bachelor of Arts in Applied Social Studies (Professional Social Care), 

Quality and Qualifications Ireland, delivered by Carlow College, St. Patrick’s 

(12) Bachelor of Arts in Social Care, Quality and Qualifications Ireland, 

delivered by The Open Training College 

(13) Bachelor of Arts (Honours) in Professional Social Care Practice, South 

East Technological University 

(14) Bachelor of Arts in Professional Social Care Practice, South East 

Technological University 

(15) Bachelor of Arts (Honours) in Applied Social Studies in Professional 

Social Care, South East Technological University 

(16) Bachelor of Arts in Applied Social Studies in Professional Social Care, 

South East Technological University 

(17) Bachelor of Arts (Honours) in Social Care Practice, South East 

Technological University 

(18) Bachelor of Arts in Applied Social Care, South East Technological 

University 

(19) Bachelor of Arts (Honours) in Professional Social Care Practice, 

Institute of Technology, Carlow 

(20) Bachelor of Arts in Professional Social Care Practice, Institute of 

Technology, Carlow 

(21) Bachelor of Arts (Honours) in Applied Social Studies in Professional 

Social Care, Institute of Technology, Carlow 

(22) Bachelor of Arts in Applied Social Studies in Professional Social Care, 

Institute of Technology, Carlow 

(23) Bachelor of Arts (Honours) in Social Care Practice, Waterford Institute 

of Technology 

(24) Bachelor of Arts in Applied Social Care, Waterford Institute of 

Technology 

(25) Bachelor of Arts 
Technological University Dublin 

in Applied Social Studies 

in Social Care, 

(26) Bachelor of Arts (Honours) in Applied Social Studies in Social Care, 

Technological University Dublin 

(27) Bachelor of Arts (Honours) in Social Care, Technological University 

Dublin 

(28) Bachelor of Arts in Applied Social Care, Technological University 

Dublin 

 4 [416] 

(29) Bachelor of Arts (Honours) in Applied Social Care, Technological 

University Dublin 

(30) Bachelor of Arts in Applied Social Studies in Social Care, Institute of 

Technology, Blanchardstown 

(31) Bachelor of Arts (Honours) in Applied Social Studies in Social Care,

(32) Bachelor of Arts in Social Care, Dublin Institute of Technology 

(33) Bachelor of Arts (Honours) in Social Care Practice, Institute of

(34) Bachelor of Arts in Social Care Practice, Institute of Technology, 

Tallaght 

(35) Bachelor of Arts in Applied Social Care, Technological University of 

the Shannon: Midlands Midwest 

(36) Bachelor of Arts 

in Applied Social Studies 

in Social Care,

(37) Bachelor of Arts (Honours) in Social Care Practice, Technological 

University of the Shannon: Midlands Midwest

Shannon: Midlands Midwest

(40) Bachelor of Arts in Applied Social Care, Athlone Institute of

(48) Honours Bachelor of Arts (Social Care), University of Galway 

 
 
 The Minister for Health approves the making of this bye-law. 

[416] 5 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
of the Minister for Health, 

25 July, 2025. 

JENNIFER CARROLL MACNEILL, 

Minister for Health. 

GIVEN under the seal of the Social Care Workers 
Registration Board, 
26 August, 2025. 

HELENA DOODY , 

Chairperson, Social Care Workers Registration Board . 

LISA MOLLOY, 

Member, Social Care Workers Registration Board.

title: on it by section 31 of the Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005 (as
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This bye-law identifies the qualifications awarded in the State which are 
approved by the Social Care Workers Registration Board as attesting to the 
standard of proficiency required for registration with the Social Care Workers 
Registration Board. 

 
 
 
 
 [416] 7
